==== Topic ====
Carl will give a presentation on <nowiki>[[http://www.ossec.net/|OSSEC]]</nowiki>. OSSEC is an Open Source Host-based Intrusion Detection System. It performs log analysis, file integrity checking, policy monitoring, rootkit detection, real-time alerting and active response.

Details:
* '''address''': Barnes and Noble @ RIT
* '''date''': March 4, 2010
* '''time''': 7pm until 9pm
* '''room''': Upstairs Meeting
